original_title: Minister proposes providing sewn school uniforms to students
original_body_lines: Minister of Industries and Entrepreneurship Development, Sunil Hadunnetti, announced plans to provide sewn school uniforms to students in the future in order to minimize wastage in uniform distribution.

Speaking at a ceremony held in Colombo, the Minister emphasized the benefits of this approach, stating it would address inefficiencies and reduce unnecessary waste often associated with the current system.
